title: WATER: IMPACTS, SPLASHES & MOVEMENTS PACK1
description: Splash Your Creativity: Let your imagination flow with our diverse water library.
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


The “WATER: IMPACTS, SPLASHES & MOVEMENTS PACK1” is our carefully created foley sound library designed for creators who seek high-quality water-related audio assets. Whether you’re working on films, games, or animation projects, this pack delivers immersive and realistic water sounds to enhance your audio design.


  • Impact/Splashes Sounds:

This category features short-length water sounds, each lasting up to 3 seconds. These impactful foley capture the essence of water colliding, splashing, and creating dynamic energy.

Expect everything from dramatic water hits to playful splashes.

  • Water Movements Sounds:

The second type focuses on longer-duration water movements. These sounds are perfect for creating ambient backgrounds or emphasizing fluid motion.


Audio Qualities:


The “WATER: IMPACTS, SPLASHES & MOVEMENTS PACK1” offers three audio qualities:

96kHz: Ideal for pristine, high-fidelity recordings.

48kHz: A balance between quality and file size.

44.1kHz: Standard CD quality.

All files are created at 24-bit depth, ensuring clarity and richness.
